feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas appropriately.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 focuses on technical terms related to geology and erosion, while Text 2 lists various minerals. Different lexical choices are observed.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have relatively simple sentence structures and average length.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 has a more explanatory tone about erosion, while Text 2 lists minerals without much narrative. Different narrative styles are evident.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free from spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in lexical choices, narrative styles, and tone between the two texts, it is unlikely they were written by the same author.
